delete.summary: Delete a categories using a specific mode

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Delete mode: "associate_and_disable" associate products with parent category and disable them, "associate_only" associate products with parent and do not change their status, "remove_associated" remove products that are associated only with category that is being deleted

delete.summary: Delete a category using a specific mode

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Delete mode: "associate_and_disable" associate products with parent category and disable them, "associate_only" associate products with parent and do not change their status, "remove_associated" remove products that are associated only with category that is being deleted
